description: Variation of wording of condition 9 (obscured windows) of planning permission ref: 2019/01437/FUL granted 4th July 2019 for the 'Demolition of existing garages, erection of a part two and part three storey single family dwellinghouse at the rear of 68 and 70 Stamford Brook Road; alterations to boundary treatment and installation of new entrance gates fronting Emlyn Road elevation; associated landscaping' to read as follows: 'The development shall not be occupied until the windows at first and second floor level on the rear and side elevations of the dwelling hereby approved are fitted with permanent, non releasable window restrictors, allowing a maximum opening of 100mm and obscure glazed up to 1.7m above floor level. They shall be permanently maintained in this form. Details of the restrictors and obscure glazing used shall have been previously submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority'.
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
